vision.origin: Marco's email, December 2023: 'I see EVA everywhere... agents talking to agents.'
vision.mission: Personal visionary project to build the future of enterprise AI

products.name: EVA Chat
products.description: Universal enterprise console where you tell EVA what to do. Example: 'Search our SharePoint for the Q3 budget template Susan used last year, then email it to my team with a note that we need to submit by Friday.' EVA Chat orchestrates multiple agents: finds the document, drafts the email with your signature, shows you the preview, sends on your approval.

use_case.title: Manager's Monday Morning Routine
steps: Opens EVA Chat: 'Show me all team updates from last week'
EVA searches Teams, Outlook, SharePoint ‚Üí summarizes 12 updates
'Schedule 1-on-1s with anyone who mentioned blockers'
EVA finds 3 people, checks calendars, books 30-min slots
'Draft status report for my VP highlighting the product launch milestone'
EVA drafts email with timeline, shows preview
Manager edits subject line, says 'Send'
use_case.result: 45-minute Monday morning routine ‚Üí 10 minutes with EVA

products.moonshot: Eventually becomes your universal enterprise console - everything you do at work, you just tell EVA.

products.name: EVA DA
products.description: Decision Assistant with Neurosymbolic AI - Combines RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) for knowledge search with RaC (Rules as Code) for logical reasoning. Ask complex policy questions across two domains: CPP-D (Disability) and Employment Insurance. EVA DA retrieves curated policy documents, applies simplified eligibility rules, and provides structured answers with: clear decision, human explanation, evaluated conditions, source citations, and disclaimers. The guardrail: AI explains, rules decide - no hallucinations on eligibility.

use_case.title: Legal Researcher Finding Precedents
steps: Lawyer asks EVA DA: 'Show appeals in Atlantic region, 2023-2024, where tribunal overturned initial decision'
EVA DA queries database (structured) + jurisprudence library (RAG) + RaC rules
Returns 23 cases with: decision text, key factors, cited statutes, outcome
Lawyer: 'Which ones cited section 42(2)(a) medical evidence requirements?'
EVA DA filters ‚Üí 8 cases, highlights relevant paragraphs
Lawyer: 'Summarize common themes in overturns'
EVA DA: 'Main themes: insufficient specialist reports (6 cases), outdated evidence (4 cases), tribunal found new functional limitations (3 cases)'
use_case.result: 3 days of manual research ‚Üí 20 minutes with EVA DA

products.moonshot: RAG+RaC neurosymbolic reasoning - probabilistic search meets logical rules, no hallucinations on eligibility.

IT Director logs in, sees dashboard: '47 active EVA spaces, $12K monthly cost, 8 spaces over budget alerts, 3 pending security reviews.' Clicks 'CPP-D Project' space, reviews: 1,200 queries this month, avg response 2.3s, 94% user satisfaction, top 5 documents accessed. Sets new budget cap: $2K/month.

use_case.title: IT Director Monthly Review

Filters by 'over budget' ‚Üí 8 spaces flagged red
Clicks 'Legal Discovery' space (highest spend: $3.2K this month)
Reviews usage: 450 queries, 12 active users, mostly document summarization
Sees spike on Nov 15-17 (court deadline prep)
Approves overage, sets alert for next spike

products.moonshot: Who's using what, spending how much, achieving what results. Single pane of glass for AI platform oversight.

products.name: EVA AskMe
products.description: Embeddable chatbot that becomes an expert on YOUR application by learning its navigation and content. HR embeds EVA AskMe widget on Benefits Portal. Widget crawls all portal pages, learns navigation structure: 'Dental plan is under Health ‚Üí Coverage Options.' Employee asks widget: 'How do I add my spouse to dental?' EVA AskMe answers: 'Go to Health Coverage ‚Üí Manage Dependents, click Add Spouse, upload marriage certificate, effective next pay period. FYI: deadline is 30 days after marriage.'

use_case.title: New Employee Onboarding Portal
use_case.scenario: Company has complex onboarding portal (20+ pages, 50+ forms)
steps: HR embeds EVA AskMe widget in corner of portal
AskMe crawls portal, maps: Home ‚Üí Direct Deposit ‚Üí Tax Forms ‚Üí Benefits ‚Üí IT Access...
New hire Day 1, confused: 'Where do I set up direct deposit?'
AskMe answers: 'Click 'Payroll Setup' in left menu, then 'Direct Deposit Form''
Employee: 'What info do I need?'
AskMe: 'Bank name, routing number, account number. You can find these on a check.'
use_case.result: 80% reduction in HR help desk tickets for navigation questions

products.moonshot: Widget learns this from portal content + HR policy docs - becomes instant expert on any application.

products.name: EVA CloneMe
products.description: Your AI proxy that attends meetings, manages your calendar, and builds RAG indexes of everything it learns FOR YOU. You say: 'Book me a meeting room for two next week, afternoon, 30 minutes. Find a slot in Shannon's calendar and send him an invite to discuss our common interests.' CloneMe checks your calendars, finds Tuesday 2pm works, books Room 405, drafts invite referencing your last 3 email threads with Shannon. Then: 'Ask CloneMe to attend the CIO debriefing I'll miss Friday, then make me a summary with my next steps.' CloneMe joins Teams meeting, takes notes, emails you: 'CIO approved the AI budget. Your action: submit Q1 forecast by Nov 30. P.S. I can now answer any questions about the AI governance proposal you presented - I've indexed your deck, the Q&A discussion, and CIO's feedback.'

use_case.title: Executive's Crazy Thursday
steps: Morning: 'CloneMe, I have back-to-back meetings 9-5 today. Monitor my Outlook for urgent items, draft holding responses.'
10:30am: CFO emails: 'Need Q4 forecast ASAP.' CloneMe drafts: 'Working on it, will have by EOD.'
2pm: Double-booked conflict detected. CloneMe: 'You're double-booked at 3pm: Product Review vs HR Budget. Which should I reschedule?'
2:05pm: You: 'Move Product Review to tomorrow afternoon.'
2:06pm: CloneMe finds slot, moves meeting, notifies 6 attendees
3pm: CloneMe attends HR Budget meeting you couldn't make, takes notes
5:30pm: You: 'CloneMe, what did I miss today?'
5:31pm: CloneMe summary: '3 urgent emails (drafted responses, await your approval), 2 meeting conflicts resolved, Shannon confirmed coffee tomorrow 10am, reminder: Q4 forecast due EOD.'
5:32pm: You: 'What was decided in the HR budget meeting?'

5:33pm: CloneMe: 'Hiring freeze through Q1 except critical roles, training budget cut 15%, bonus pool protected. Your next step: revise Q1 hiring plan by next Wednesday. Want me to draft it based on current open reqs?'
use_case.result: Stayed on top of 47 emails, 8 meetings, 0 dropped balls + instant recall of meetings you missed

products.moonshot: CloneMe builds a RAG index of every meeting it attends FOR YOU, becoming your expert proxy on those topics. Saves 2+ hours/day.

products.name: EVA Vision
products.description: Accessibility-first AI making data visualization accessible to everyone through voice and screen reader technology. Blind analyst opens dashboard, says: 'EVA, what's on this screen?' EVA: 'Revenue dashboard, 6 charts. Top left shows Q3 down 12% in Atlantic region, red bar.' Analyst: 'Drill into Atlantic, show me by product line.' EVA: 'Opening Atlantic detail... Software licenses down 23%, consulting up 8%.' Analyst: 'Create a what-if scenario: if we discount software 15%, what's the revenue impact?' EVA runs calculation, narrates results.
products.moonshot: Makes Power BI accessible to everyone. Voice + screen reader revolution for data analysts.

products.name: EVA IQ
products.description: The Context Engine - Microsoft Work IQ + Fabric IQ equivalent. Builds enterprise work graph (who works on what, using which artifacts) and domain ontologies (business entities, relationships, metrics). Provides contextual intelligence to all EVA products, transforming generic AI into your organization's AI that understands your people, projects, and data semantics.
products.moonshot: Your AI knows your organization's context - not generic responses, but answers grounded in your enterprise reality.

products.name: EVA RaC
products.description: Rules as Code - Neurosymbolic AI. Policy and legislation encoded as machine-readable logic (OpenFisca-based), exposed via APIM. LLMs provide explanations, RaC enforces decisions - the guardrail ensuring AI never hallucinates on eligibility, entitlement, or compliance. Transforms policy review from retrospective audits to continuous 'digital twin' simulation and scenario testing.
products.moonshot: Policy-as-code with continuous simulation - test legislative changes before they're enacted.

products.moonshot: Native OS-level AI integration - EVA becomes part of your Windows experience.

products.name: EVA LiveOps
products.description: AI-Assisted Operations Dashboard - The operational nerve center for EVA Suite. Real-time KPIs (sessions, errors, latency, costs), time-series visualizations, and an AI-powered Copilot that provides intelligent insights from multiple viewpoints: Overview, Reliability, Performance, and Cost. Instead of drowning in metrics, LiveOps surfaces what matters with AI-generated findings and recommendations. Think 'How is EVA doing right now?' - answered intelligently.

Sees 4,821 sessions in last 24h, 0.7% error rate, 640ms P95 latency, $37 APIM cost

Clicks 'Reliability' viewpoint in AI Copilot panel
EVA: 'Error rate stable but 34 timeout errors spiked at 2pm - investigate API Gateway'
Lead checks logs, finds temp Azure region slowdown (resolved)

Lead: 'Add Redis cache investigation to sprint backlog'
use_case.result: 10-minute intelligent review vs 45 minutes manually analyzing logs and charts

products.moonshot: AI-powered observability - predict and prevent incidents before they impact users. Operations dashboard that thinks.

Legal team discovers it, reads reviews (4.8 stars, 127 uses), clicks 'Deploy to my EVA Portal.' Agent appears in their EVA Chat with custom slash-command: /contract-analyze [document]. Enterprise governance pre-approves agents before marketplace listing.

products.name: EVA Channel Interactivity
products.description: The Paradigm Shift: Every EVA product works 3 ways simultaneously - Traditional UI (click menus, fill forms, navigate screens), Chat Interface (type commands in natural language, EVA executes multi-step workflows), Voice Commands (speak requests, EVA responds via audio + screen updates). Example: Same task 3 ways - 'Create expense report for Paris trip': UI Mode: Click Expenses ‚Üí New ‚Üí Select Trip ‚Üí Add receipts ‚Üí Calculate totals ‚Üí Submit. Chat Mode: Type: 'EVA, create expense report for Paris trip Nov 10-15, attach hotel/flight receipts from OneDrive'. Voice Mode: Say: 'EVA, expense report Paris trip' (EVA narrates steps, you approve with 'yes' or 'submit').
products.moonshot: Users choose their interaction style. Power users use voice for speed. New users use UI with chat hints. Accessibility users rely on voice narration. Same powerful features, your preferred channel.

products.name: EVA Home
products.description: The Origin Story: Marco renamed his Alexa to 'EVA' - and realized the vision extends beyond the office. EVA Home brings your enterprise AI assistant to your home device (Alexa, Google Home, Apple HomePod). Example: You're driving home, you say: 'EVA, what did I miss at work today?' EVA summarizes: '3 urgent emails (Shannon needs Q1 forecast by EOD), CloneMe attended your 3pm budget meeting (hiring freeze through Q1), and your VP approved the AI proposal - you present to executives next Wednesday.' Then: 'EVA, remind me tomorrow morning to review the executive deck.' EVA: 'Reminder set for 8am.' The Twist: Your work EVA and home EVA are the same intelligence - seamless context across devices.

steps: 6:30pm: Marco arrives home, says: 'EVA, catch me up'

6:31pm: EVA Home (via Alexa speaker): 'You have 2 urgent items: CFO needs Q4 forecast by 9am tomorrow, and Shannon confirmed coffee meeting moved to Wednesday 10am. CloneMe attended your HR budget meeting - hiring freeze through Q1 except critical roles. Your action: revise Q1 hiring plan by next Wednesday.'
6:32pm: Marco: 'EVA, set reminder for 7am tomorrow: finish Q4 forecast before CFO meeting'

7:45am next day: Marco's phone alarm + EVA reminder: 'Good morning. Your Q4 forecast outline is ready for review. You have 2 hours before the CFO meeting.'
use_case.result: Work continues seamlessly across office EVA ‚Üí home EVA ‚Üí morning EVA. Zero context loss, proactive planning, always prepared.

products.name: EVA Accessibility
products.description: AI-Powered WCAG Scanner - Accessibility-first development assistant. Simulates scanning a target website (EVA Suite Product Explorer) and provides detailed accessibility audit: overall grade, issue counts (errors, warnings, passes), and itemized findings with WCAG references, severity levels, problem descriptions, and suggested fixes. Includes 'AI Accessibility Coach' panel offering quick-win recommendations and next steps. Think of it as your accessibility copilot - making WCAG compliance actionable for developers and designers.

use_case.title: Frontend Dev's Accessibility Review
steps: Developer opens EVA Accessibility after building new feature
Sees scan target: EVA Suite - Product Explorer, Grade B (demo)
Summary: 7 issues, 4 warnings, 23 passes
Reviews Issue AX1 (WCAG 1.4.3): 'Some secondary text contrast below 4.5:1 - darken background'
Issue AX2 (WCAG 2.4.1): 'No skip link for keyboard users - add jump to main content'
AI Accessibility Coach suggests: 'Quick fixes: add skip link, raise text contrast, use semantic headings, group product cards with ARIA labels'
Developer: 'I can fix 3 of these in 20 minutes'
Makes changes, re-scans ‚Üí Grade A-
use_case.result: Actionable accessibility insights in minutes vs days of manual WCAG audits

products.moonshot: Make every application accessible by default - accessibility as AI-powered guidance, not an afterthought.

products.name: EVA DevTools
products.description: AI Agile Crew - Sprint Dashboard for AI-Assisted Development. This is the DevTools that builds DevTools - showing how EVA Suite itself gets developed with AI assistance.

Includes 'EVA Process Coach' panel explaining the map and identifying optimization opportunities.

products.name: EVA Impact Analyzer
products.description: ROI Calculator for EVA Suite - Executive-friendly business case tool. Choose from 3 illustrative scenarios (Conservative, Expected, Ambitious) to model department-wide EVA rollout impact. Input employee count, hours saved per week, hourly cost, and platform cost - get instant outputs: annual hours saved, gross/net savings, ROI percentage, and payback period in months. Includes 'Impact Narrator' panel translating numbers into executive-friendly narratives. Answers the CFO's question: 'If I invest $X in EVA, what do I get back and how fast?'

Impact Narrator: 'At roughly one hour saved per week per knowledge worker, EVA becomes a major productivity lever with fast payback'

CIO switches: 500 employees, 0.5 hours/week ‚Üí still 245% ROI, 4-month payback
CFO: 'Even conservative looks compelling. Let's proceed.'

products.moonshot: Business impact modeling from weeks to seconds - transparent, defensible ROI for AI investments. CFO-friendly intelligence.
